title: Systems Consultant
description: Served as a paid technical consultant for Brown's system administration and department machines.

title: Cloud Engineer Intern
description: Leveraged AWS to manage company's cloud structure and deploy GitHub Actions workflows. Built JavaScript unit tests for Ramina Server codebase using Mocha framework. Designed and executed tests for Raman Spectroscopy device using Model XML and SPC file simulations.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Collaborated with peers to develop websites, applications, etc. for organizations around Brown's campus.

title: Software Development Intern
description: Built an in-air pathogen (COVID-19) scheduler for the new AerosolSense Sampler prototype using wireframe mockup with Bootstrap JS implementation. Upgraded SourceTree and Jira documentation processes to improve company workflows.
